    • find

      protected BST.Node<E> find(BST.Node<E> node, E element)
      Returns the Node containing a specific Element, or null otherwise.
      Parameters:
      element - the element to find
      Returns:
      the Node that contains the Element, or null otherwise

      This method despite not being essential is very useful. It is written here in order to be used by this class and its subclasses avoiding recoding. So its access level is protected
